programme.desc: Part-time drag queen Adam hopes to dazzle his guests with an evening of theatrical flamboyance as the culinary competition continues in the Derby and Nottingham area.(n)

programme.desc: Apu becomes the proud father of octuplets and enjoys being showered with free gifts from companies that want him to endorse their products - until a couple in nearby Shelbyville go one better by having nine children. Cartoon capers, featuring the voice of former Munsters actor Butch Patrick.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Sienna doesn't want to leave Warren after finding out about the child arrangement order, so decides to make him love her again and tries to seduce him at The Loft. However, she falls to the floor after a tussle with Cindy, which leaves her fearing she may have lost the babies.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of pioneering veterinary practice Fitzpatrick Referrals in Surrey, where orthopaedic-neuro veterinary surgeon Noel Fitzpatrick and his team help some of the nation's hardest-to-cure pets using cutting-edge procedures. A man travels through the night to bring his much-loved doberman down from Cumbria to see Noel Fitzpatrick about a diseased spinal cord. Can the professor and his staff bring the canine back to health? Other cases this week are a cocker spaniel rushed in after being hit by a car and a rabbit that needs surgery for a broken ankle.(n)

programme.title: Catching a Killer
programme.desc: Documentary about Thames Valley Police's investigation into the disappearance of 31-year-old mother of three Natalie Hemming on May 1, 2016. The programme has extraordinary access to the officers as they try to work out whether Natalie is alive or dead, and to her family and friends, struggling with the situation unfolding around them, before an arrest is made and the case reaches its heartbreaking conclusion.(n)

programme.title: One Killer Punch
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the consequences of deadly single hits, from a row over a parking space in a supermarket car park to an unanticipated fight outside a nightclub. By examining three different assaults, the film shows that a single punch can have a colossal effect, often in innocuous locations and circumstances. The programme hears from three accidental killers and observes the circumstances that led up to a fatal punch, how their lives have changed, how their guilt affects them and the complex emotional journey that follows.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Ladies' man Luke, 30, is ready to give up playing the field and is searching for the one. His date is 29-year-old PR manager Sophie. Tired of turning up to weddings alone, she's looking for a man to become her 'plus-one' in life. The restaurant also welcomes Bristolian mother of three Mandy, whose date is 52-year-old landscape gardener Andrew.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay

After his partner recently stepped away from the business, former engineer Trevor has been forced front of house, but it soon becomes clear to the hotel inspector and his guests that it is not his natural habitat.(n)

programme.desc: Jon Bentley and Georgie Barrat head to north Wales to test a Parrot Disco fixed-wing drone against a DJI Mavi, the latter being a more traditional quadcopter. Georgie also goes behind the scenes at a stately home in Hampshire that doubles as one of the world's most advanced computer research labs. Plus, Jordan Erica Webber reports on the latest gaming releases. Presented by Craig Charles.(n)

programme.title: Access

programme.desc: Justin and Tori confiscate Brody's bank cards until he is drug-free, Leah tells Zac that their marriage is over and Roo collapses while moving back into Summer Bay House.(n)

However, when he comes face to face with the fugitive, he is tricked into answering a phone wired to a car bomb.(n)

programme.desc: Premiere. A retired police officer, despondent over the deaths of his family, meets a mysterious woman who through her personal stories gives him a reason to rethink what is most important to him. Drama, starring Joey Lawrence, Robin Riker, Muse Watson and Catalina Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.sub-title: Party Election Broadcast: The Green Party.
programme.desc: A party election broadcast on behalf of the Green Party ahead of the general election.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Dan Brigginshaw tracks down a driver who has given him the slip on the side roads of Spalding, while Suzie Ranyard comes to the rescue of a motorist with a rather large passenger. Jim Woolerton utilises some of the unit's most advanced kit to catch out a disqualified driver and officers are called out when a dead body is spotted in one of Lincolnshire's many waterways.(n)

programme.title: The Great Fire
programme.desc: New series. Dan Jones, Suzannah Lipscomb and Rob Bell take a fresh look at the Great Fire of London in 1666 by walking the actual route the fire took across the city, hour-by-hour and street-by-street, hoping to uncover what really happened during Britain's worst inferno. In this first edition, the three presenters investigate how the fire started, heading to Pudding Lane, site of the bakery where the blaze broke out. Dan and historian Dorian Gerhold then place a temporary `blue plaque' on the very spot where the fire began.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Officers chase £4,500 in court fees in North Wales after a property deal turned sour, and in Birmingham the agents try to collect over £3,500 from a single mum who defaulted on loan repayments. Elsewhere in Worcestershire, the enforcement agents try to recover more than £10,000 from a shop-keeper for fraudulently keeping a deposit during a property sale.(n)

programme.title: The Butcher Surgeon: Why Wasn't He Stopped
programme.desc: Documentary profiling former breast surgeon Ian Paterson, who was recently convicted of intentionally wounding patients by performing needless operations for more than a decade. Paterson was found guilty on 17 counts, and this programme examines how was he able to continue for so long, asking whether his employers might have ignored or failed to act on a series of warnings stretching back to 2003. Some of Paterson's victims are also interviewed, along with health service whistleblowers.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A Monmouthshire man who was fenced in by his neighbours, who were not happy about him using their driveway to access his own home, and a West Hampstead flat owner who received complaints from his downstairs neighbour over his dog barking. Plus, the Bolton family whose new neighbour's overfriendliness soon became a little too close for comfort.(n)

programme.title: Benefits Britain: Life on the Dole
programme.desc: This edition focuses on young people living on state welfare, including 18-year-old Dean from Harlow in Essex, who has no intention of getting a job unless forced. Twentysomethings Danielle and her boyfriend Josh are unable to work due to anxiety and depression and have moved to Blackpool to make a new start. However, with four children between them from previous relationships and another on the way they are struggling to make ends meet on a joint benefits income of around £100 a week.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth Prison
programme.desc: In the wake of new governor Ferguson's crackdown on drugs, Franky's determination to stay as top dog has fatal consequences for a new inmate. Bea uses her husband Harry's request for a divorce to try to force him to help her avenge daughter Debbie's death, while Doreen meets a handsome male prisoner while working on a garden project. Drama, starring Danielle Cormack and Nicole da Silva.(n)

programme.title: Witches: A Century of Murder
programme.desc: Suzannah Lipscomb's investigation into the notorious 17th-century witch trials concludes with a profile of Matthew Hopkins, the opportunistic puritan witch-hunter who transformed paranoia about Satanism into a lucrative business as he hanged hundreds of people for crimes they could not possibly have committed. Making use of contemporary reports, Suzannah paints a portrait of a man who believed he could cross any boundary and break any law to achieve his goals. Naming himself `Witchfinder General', Hopkins toured the country charging fees for his services, but Suzannah's research reveals that ultimately, the public's distaste for witches was not as strong as its hatred of being conned by charlatans. Hopkins would eventually die of tuberculosis in relative obscurity, but his malign legacy lived on across the Atlantic, as witch-hunts began in Salem, Massachusetts.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice and Alistair Appleton look back over home improvement highlights from the series, and focus on making the most of original features.(n)

programme.title: Divine Designs
programme.desc: Paul Binski examines pre-Reformation approaches to moral instruction, contrasting the humorous stone gargoyles of St Andrew's Church in Heckington, Lincolnshire, with the stark and sombre stained-glass windows found at St Mary's in the Gloucestershire town of Fairford.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Lily invites a friendly seal to the Cockle Cafe and uses the pencil she found on the beach to take his order. Nonna is not keen on his manners.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: Kerry is in a mad mood after his song is not selected for a competition, so Mofy tries to cheer him up.(n)

programme.desc: Leah befriends a fox that can turn invisible, but Zeta tries to capture the animal for its magical powers.(n)

programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Lost Race.
programme.desc: Revs unexpectedly slows down during a race, and when Noddy tries to find out why, he discovers that Revs was hoping to find a friend.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A fantasy fire-breathing dragon comes to life, and it will not let Ryder and the pups into the lookout.(n)

programme.desc: The little girl and baby penguin Peggy persuade a bear that swimming in icy water can be fun.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: Alien learns how to play hopscotch, but he finds it difficult finding a stone to throw.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: The day's news comes under scrutiny from Matthew Wright and the panel, with viewers and the studio audience invited to share their opinions.(n)

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi turns referee to settle a problem between Donna, the manager of Redditch hotel The Blue Inn, and the owner, who monitors her every move on CCTV cameras from her office more than 400 miles away in Paris. Despite having 15 staff, Donna works 100 hours a week and insists on getting too hands-on, so Alex asks her to devise a plan to get more heads on beds before they cross the Channel to see the boss.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Stewart and Elmor attempt to collect £5,000 owed by a debtor in north Wales, but the situation spirals out of control when a group of friends try to take on the agents. Meanwhile, Del and Dael head to south-east London to chase nearly £7,000 owed by a man to his ex-girlfriend, before visiting a woman who owes her solicitor almost £4,000 after a compensation claim went wrong. In Manchester, Stewart and Vic face a hostile reception at a family-run garage that owes £6,000 in professional fees.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Morag wants to appeal against John's sentence, but Marilyn sees a different side of him in an incident in prison. James urges Roo to get a professional opinion about her health.(n)

programme.desc: Elly tries to gather evidence to bring Finn down, Lauren chastises Jack for letting Paige go off alone, and Jack wrestles with his decision to leave the Church.(n)

programme.desc: A special agent disappears during an undercover assignment, forcing the team to work alongside the LAPD in a case that involves human-trafficking, money-laundering and drugs. Starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: Alone in the Wild: Deadly Survival
programme.desc: After a plane crash leaves them stranded in the Canadian wilderness, young siblings Hannah and Zach battle all that nature has to throw at them. Alongside trusty dog Chinook, the duo face bears, wolves and a raging wildfire in their bid to find safety. Family drama, starring Natasha Henstridge and Ted Whitall, with CJ Adams and Erin Pitt as the stranded youngsters.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Elly tries to gather evidence to bring Finn down, Lauren chastises Jack for letting Paige go off alone, and Jack wrestles with his decision to leave the Church.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Morag wants to appeal against John's sentence, but Marilyn sees a different side of him in an incident in prison. James urges Roo to get a professional opinion about her health.(n)

programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.sub-title: Party Election Broadcast: UK Independence Party: 1/6/2017.
programme.desc: By the UK Independence Party.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Historian Dan Jones heads south east of England to explore the turbulent history of Dover Castle. He reveals that Henry II ordered its construction not only as a statement of royal power, but also out of guilt for the murder of Thomas Becket, the Archbishop of Canterbury, in 1170. Dan discovers how a vast network of tunnels was used to defend the castle, including underground barracks built during the Napoleonic Wars and a nuclear bunker created during the Cold War.(n)

programme.title: The Great Fire
programme.sub-title: The Great Fire: Death and Destruction.
programme.desc: The team continues to walk the path of the infamous inferno, uncovering what really happened on the worst day of the four-day rampage. Dan Jones charts the destruction of the city's buildings, including London's spiritual home St Paul's Cathedral, which burned so fiercely its stones exploded. Suzannah Lipscomb reveals how Pudding Lane baker Thomas Farriner made sure no blame landed on him and Rob Bell finds out how the fire moved so fast.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Catching up with the victims and villains of the housing rental market. Rachel intended to rent out her Snowdonia cottage for only three months. Four years later her tenant is still there and not paying any rent. Plus, the stories of Stevenage landlord Derek, whose tenant Kellie proved so troublesome that the police had to be called, and Claud from south London, who was left £30,000 in debt when a professional couple split up.(n)

programme.title: Extraordinary People
programme.sub-title: The World's Heaviest Child: Extraordinary People.
programme.desc: The story of 11-year-old Arya Permana from Indonesia, who weighs a massive 30 stone - nearly three times that of an average man. His status as the world's heaviest boy has brought fame and considerable financial benefits - but when he becomes house-bound and his health begins to deteriorate, his parents realise they must seek medical help. Can the doctors' tests get to the root cause of the boy's extraordinary weight gain?.(n)

programme.title: Restless Legs Syndrome: Desperate for Help
programme.desc: Documentary about people with a compulsion to constantly move their feet. It's a condition so severe for some that they want to have their legs chopped off. Cameras follow the pensioner who contemplates suicide due to severe sleep deprivation caused by his tingling legs, and the sufferer who is housebound due to the embarrassment of her wriggling legs.(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In this survival tale based on a true story, a 19th century frontiersman is left for dead after being attacked by his comrades, only to survive and claim his revenge(n)

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: Based on the popular series of books by Darren Shan, Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant tells the story of a small-town teen who inadvertently shatters a 200-year-old truce between warring factions of vampires. Sixteen-year-old Darren (Chris Massoglia) is your typical adolescent; he spends most of his time with his best friend, Steve (Josh Hutcherson), earns decent grades, and generally manages to stay out of trouble. But trouble finds Darren when he and Steve make the acquaintance of a vampire named Larten Crepsley (John C. Reilly) while attending a traveling freak show at a local theater. Transformed into a bloodsucker by Crepsley, Darren joins the Cirque Du Freak and quickly ingratiates himself with the unusual cast of characters who populate it, including Madame Truska the Bearded Lady (Salma Hayek) and the traveling sideshow's towering barker (Ken Watanabe). As Darren works to master his newfound powers as a budding member of the supernatural underworld, he becomes a valued pawn between the vampires and their deadlier rivals, the Vampaneze. With tensions between the two sects intensifying, Darren must figure out a means of keeping the coming war from destroying his last vestige of humanity. Patrick Fugit, Orlando Jones, Willem Dafoe, and Jane Krakowski co-star(n)

programme.title: Emelie
programme.desc: In this tense thriller, two suburban parents hire a new babysitter to look after their three kids while they enjoy a night out, but the sitter eventually reveals herself to be an unhinged imposter who has sinister designs on the family's youngest child(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: Horror remake. A young family move to a big house in the New York suburbs which they bought at a bargain price. But when they start to be terrorised by supernatural forces, they discover the house was the scene of a recent mass killing and was also the home of an 18th-century satanist(n)

programme.title: Harold & Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay
programme.desc: Mistaken for terrorists, stoners Harold and Kumar are thrown into maximum security prison(n)

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: Fast-paced action comedy in which a dowdy romantic-adventure writer is hurled into a real-life adventure in the Colombian jungle in order to save her sister, who will be killed if a treasure map is not delivered to her captors. She is helped out by a brash mercenary, and together they search for the priceless gem located in the map. A non-stop mix of thrills, laughter and romance with energetic performances all round(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: This biographical drama explores the genius and shortcomings of computing guru Steve Jobs in backstage vignettes spanning 14 years, as he and his closest advisers prepare for three different public presentations of era-defining technologies(n)

programme.title: Man on the Moon
programme.desc: Biopic of controversial comedian Andy Kaufman, starring Jim Carrey. Star of Taxi and Saturday Night Live, Kaufman was a troubled individual for whom the boundaries of reality and stage performance were often blurred. Frequently misunderstood, even by those closest to him, he remained a strictly maverick entertainer until his untimely death from lung cancer in 1984(n)

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: In this thrilling spy film, Will Holloway, a former MI-5 agent, is forced to partner with Harry Pearce, the man decommissioned him, to apprehend a terrorist who escaped during routine prisoner transport and prevent an attack on the city of London. Based on a British televison series "Spooks."(n)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: An artist and an ex-CIA agent work together to take down terrorists in France(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: This satirical comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a political consultant gives viewers an inside look at the high-stakes, win-at-all-costs world of politics. Bullock stars as "Calamity" Jane Bodine, who is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival Pat Candy (Billy Bob Thornton), who is working on the opponent's campaign and is also looking for every opportunity to antagonize Jane. The film is loosely based on the 2005 documentary of the same name by Rachel Boynton. Directed by David Gordon Green (Pineapple Express, George Washington). Produced by Oscar-winners George Clooney and Grant Heslov(n)

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: Michael Clayton handles all of the dirty work for a major New York law firm, arranging top-flight legal services and skirting through loopholes for ethically questionable clients. But when a fellow fixer decides to turn on the very firm they were hired to clean up for, Clayton finds himself at the centre of a conspiratorial maelstrom(n)

programme.title: Blood and Wine
programme.desc: Modern-day film noir, set in Miami, about a wine merchant and a jewel thief who plan the theft of a one million dollar diamond necklace. But things go awry when the wine merchant's wife and son decide to leave him - unwittingly taking the stolen necklace with them(n)

programme.title: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: "Mad Max" sequel about survival in a post-apocalyptic wasteland(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: (2002) Ben Affleck stars as CIA agent Jack Ryan in Paul Alden Robinson's adaptation of Tom Clancy's novel. Ryan faces a race against time to track down terrorists who have acquired a nuclear weapon and plan to detonate it at the Super Bowl, implicating the Russians as the perpetrators and triggering a nuclear exchange(n)

programme.title: Captain Ron
programme.desc: After he inherits a yacht, Chicago businessman Martin totes his family to the Caribbean to claim it. Not having any skill at boating, he hires long-haired, one-eyed low-life Captain Ron, to pilot the heap to Miami. During the journey, the somewhat inept sailor frequently loses his way while becoming a hit with everyone in the family--except Martin(n)

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Savory blend of comedy, drama and romance stars the captivating Catherine Zeta-Jones as a workaholic New York City chef who must deal with taking charge of her orphaned 9-year-old niece (Abigail Breslin) and a free-spirited coworker (Aaron Eckhart) who has intruded on her kitchen and, in typical opposites-attract fashion, found his way into her heart. The film is a remake of the 2001 German hit "Mostly Martha." Patricia Clarkson, Bob Balaban, Jenny Wade. Directed by Scott Hicks(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Three men relive their carefree college years by killing off as many brain cells as possible in this hilarious comedy. Mitch (Luke Wilson) returns home from a less-than-pleasant business trip one evening to discover his wife, Heidi (Juliette Lewis), involved in a ménage à trois with two blindfolded strangers. Feeling less than welcome at home after this, Mitch rents a house near the campus of a nearby college; two of Mitch's old college buddies, Beanie (Vince Vaughn) and Frank (Will Ferrell). Starring Will Ferrell, Vince Vaughn, Luke Wilson & Juliette Lewis(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: FedEx employee Chuck Noland lives his life by clockwork. But his promise to his girlfriend to be back from Moscow for New Year looks doubtful when a terrifying plane crash strands him in the middle of the Pacific. An elemental drama of hope and survival(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: Satirical action drama set in the aftermath of the Gulf War. Four soldiers, finding a map indicating the location of secret bunkers inside the Iraqi border, go AWOL and head for the bunkers to get the gold looted from Kuwait which they believe to be hidden inside. However, they find a population being terrorised by Saddam Hussein's forces and desperate for help, and soon realise some things are more important than riches(n)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: Three masked intruders terrorise a young couple in a secluded country house(n)

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Horror tale in which a group of teenagers who believe they have cheated death find themselves at the mercy of an unknown force that seems intent on killing them off one by one. When one of the group's violent prophecy is fulfilled in the form of a plane crash, he and the others who left the flight are subjected to paranormal horror(n)

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: Darry and Trish spend the long hours of their road trip bickering and scoring points off each other. There doesn't seem to be anyone else on their remote country road, until a maniacal driver scares them witless. Old-fashioned terror with some great suspense(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: In the nerve-shredding third installment of this horror series about a night when all crime is legal, an ex-cop who refused to murder his son's killer must now act as the head of security for a presidential candidate who wants to end "the Purge."(n)

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: In 1970s France, a former dancer and her writer husband take a cross-country journey to a small coastal town where they bond with its quirky but wise inhabitants(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In this survival tale based on a true story, a 19th century frontiersman is left for dead after being attacked by his comrades, only to survive and claim his revenge(n)

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: Based on the popular series of books by Darren Shan, Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant tells the story of a small-town teen who inadvertently shatters a 200-year-old truce between warring factions of vampires. Sixteen-year-old Darren (Chris Massoglia) is your typical adolescent; he spends most of his time with his best friend, Steve (Josh Hutcherson), earns decent grades, and generally manages to stay out of trouble. But trouble finds Darren when he and Steve make the acquaintance of a vampire named Larten Crepsley (John C. Reilly) while attending a traveling freak show at a local theater. Transformed into a bloodsucker by Crepsley, Darren joins the Cirque Du Freak and quickly ingratiates himself with the unusual cast of characters who populate it, including Madame Truska the Bearded Lady (Salma Hayek) and the traveling sideshow's towering barker (Ken Watanabe). As Darren works to master his newfound powers as a budding member of the supernatural underworld, he becomes a valued pawn between the vampires and their deadlier rivals, the Vampaneze. With tensions between the two sects intensifying, Darren must figure out a means of keeping the coming war from destroying his last vestige of humanity. Patrick Fugit, Orlando Jones, Willem Dafoe, and Jane Krakowski co-star(n)

programme.title: Emelie
programme.desc: In this tense thriller, two suburban parents hire a new babysitter to look after their three kids while they enjoy a night out, but the sitter eventually reveals herself to be an unhinged imposter who has sinister designs on the family's youngest child(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: Horror remake. A young family move to a big house in the New York suburbs which they bought at a bargain price. But when they start to be terrorised by supernatural forces, they discover the house was the scene of a recent mass killing and was also the home of an 18th-century satanist(n)

programme.title: Harold & Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay
programme.desc: Mistaken for terrorists, stoners Harold and Kumar are thrown into maximum security prison(n)

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: Fast-paced action comedy in which a dowdy romantic-adventure writer is hurled into a real-life adventure in the Colombian jungle in order to save her sister, who will be killed if a treasure map is not delivered to her captors. She is helped out by a brash mercenary, and together they search for the priceless gem located in the map. A non-stop mix of thrills, laughter and romance with energetic performances all round(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: This biographical drama explores the genius and shortcomings of computing guru Steve Jobs in backstage vignettes spanning 14 years, as he and his closest advisers prepare for three different public presentations of era-defining technologies(n)

programme.title: Man on the Moon
programme.desc: Biopic of controversial comedian Andy Kaufman, starring Jim Carrey. Star of Taxi and Saturday Night Live, Kaufman was a troubled individual for whom the boundaries of reality and stage performance were often blurred. Frequently misunderstood, even by those closest to him, he remained a strictly maverick entertainer until his untimely death from lung cancer in 1984(n)

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: In this thrilling spy film, Will Holloway, a former MI-5 agent, is forced to partner with Harry Pearce, the man decommissioned him, to apprehend a terrorist who escaped during routine prisoner transport and prevent an attack on the city of London. Based on a British televison series "Spooks."(n)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: An artist and an ex-CIA agent work together to take down terrorists in France(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: This satirical comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a political consultant gives viewers an inside look at the high-stakes, win-at-all-costs world of politics. Bullock stars as "Calamity" Jane Bodine, who is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival Pat Candy (Billy Bob Thornton), who is working on the opponent's campaign and is also looking for every opportunity to antagonize Jane. The film is loosely based on the 2005 documentary of the same name by Rachel Boynton. Directed by David Gordon Green (Pineapple Express, George Washington). Produced by Oscar-winners George Clooney and Grant Heslov(n)

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: Michael Clayton handles all of the dirty work for a major New York law firm, arranging top-flight legal services and skirting through loopholes for ethically questionable clients. But when a fellow fixer decides to turn on the very firm they were hired to clean up for, Clayton finds himself at the centre of a conspiratorial maelstrom(n)

programme.title: Blood and Wine
programme.desc: Modern-day film noir, set in Miami, about a wine merchant and a jewel thief who plan the theft of a one million dollar diamond necklace. But things go awry when the wine merchant's wife and son decide to leave him - unwittingly taking the stolen necklace with them(n)

programme.title: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: "Mad Max" sequel about survival in a post-apocalyptic wasteland(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: (2002) Ben Affleck stars as CIA agent Jack Ryan in Paul Alden Robinson's adaptation of Tom Clancy's novel. Ryan faces a race against time to track down terrorists who have acquired a nuclear weapon and plan to detonate it at the Super Bowl, implicating the Russians as the perpetrators and triggering a nuclear exchange(n)

programme.title: Captain Ron
programme.desc: After he inherits a yacht, Chicago businessman Martin totes his family to the Caribbean to claim it. Not having any skill at boating, he hires long-haired, one-eyed low-life Captain Ron, to pilot the heap to Miami. During the journey, the somewhat inept sailor frequently loses his way while becoming a hit with everyone in the family--except Martin(n)

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Savory blend of comedy, drama and romance stars the captivating Catherine Zeta-Jones as a workaholic New York City chef who must deal with taking charge of her orphaned 9-year-old niece (Abigail Breslin) and a free-spirited coworker (Aaron Eckhart) who has intruded on her kitchen and, in typical opposites-attract fashion, found his way into her heart. The film is a remake of the 2001 German hit "Mostly Martha." Patricia Clarkson, Bob Balaban, Jenny Wade. Directed by Scott Hicks(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Three men relive their carefree college years by killing off as many brain cells as possible in this hilarious comedy. Mitch (Luke Wilson) returns home from a less-than-pleasant business trip one evening to discover his wife, Heidi (Juliette Lewis), involved in a ménage à trois with two blindfolded strangers. Feeling less than welcome at home after this, Mitch rents a house near the campus of a nearby college; two of Mitch's old college buddies, Beanie (Vince Vaughn) and Frank (Will Ferrell). programme.title: The Sky Is Not the Limit
programme.desc: Colonel Chris Hadfield, the first Canadian to walk in space, discusses what it takes to become an astronaut. The one-time commander of the International Space Station shares an insight into the training, skills and preparation essential to running the orbital facility, and offers a view of Earth from the perspective of someone who has seen it from 370km above the surface.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Sun
programme.desc: Using satellite images and the expertise of Britain's leading solar scientists, Kate Humble and Helen Czerski investigate the inner workings of the star and the influence its cycles of activity have on Earth. They reveal the sun is more active now than it has been for a decade, sending out super-heated plasma and waves of radiation, and examine why some experts think longer-term changes in its behaviour may have powerful effects on the world's climate.(n)

programme.title: Nova: Chasing Pluto
programme.desc: Documentary detailing planetary scientists' efforts to send a probe into the deepest reaches of outer space. On July 14, 2015, the New Horizons spacecraft was scheduled to fly by Pluto, aiming to take the first-ever detailed pictures of the dwarf planet. The craft was also intended to make dramatic new discoveries about the vast realm of icy bodies situated beyond Neptune - considered to be relics from the earliest days of the Solar System. Here, researchers discuss what they hoped New Horizons might be able to tell them about other alien worlds.(n)

programme.title: Voyager: To the Final Frontier
programme.desc: Dallas Campbell tells the story of the Voyager Space Mission, which saw two unmanned spacecraft leave Earth to explore the farthest reaches of the solar system. The probes were launched in 1977, and became the first man-made objects to visit Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune and Uranus. Having travelled 11 billion miles to date, the pair now journey beyond the influence of Earth's sun, bearing a record of human civilisation in case of discovery by other species.(n)

programme.title: Can We Make a Star on Earth
programme.desc: Professor Brian Cox embarks on a global tour to discover why, after decades of research, nuclear fusion has not yet become a feasible source of energy.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: Cosmic Dawn - The Real Moment of Creation.
programme.desc: The scientific story behind the moment the first stars appeared in the universe, known as the Cosmic Dawn, which transformed the dark world originally created by the Big Bang. Astronomers now have the tools to explore this dramatic event that created the first ingredients of life as we know it, when the first stars were born to light up the universe. With contributions by Professor Tom Abel, Professor Volker Bromm, Charmaine Green and Margaret Whitehurst.(n)

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: A minor-league catcher and a baseball groupie team to help a talented young pitcher make it to the big leagues, and fall in love in the process(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Remake of the Steve McQueen caper film with Pierce Brosnan as a billionaire art fancier who orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece(n)

programme.title: Hope Floats
programme.desc: A woman who comes back to her home town in Smithville, Texas, with her daughter after a very sloppy and painful divorce has to deal with the people in her town(n)

programme.title: 'Neath Arizona Skies
programme.desc: Western with John Wayne as the guardian of a little girl that needs to find her missing father, so she can finally have her late mother's money. The only problem is that a dangerous gang has their eyes on the money as well(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphan named Ella is treated cruelly by her stepmother and stepsisters, who force her to do menial chores. However, her life changes forever when she meets a prince(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: When two children find a mysterious old board game and start to play it, they release a mysterious man called Alan, who's closely followed by a horde of stampedimg animals! It seeems he and a friend discovered the game 25 years earlier, and he became trapped in it. Can the two kids tame the madcap menagerie and help Alan to escape from his supernatural prison? Great computer animated effects and some excellent perfromances make this a truly magical film that's fun for all the family(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: The walls of time and space break down in this rollicking sci-fi adventure, in which an ambitious teen discovers a pin that transports her to a futuristic world. She then teams up with a jaded genius, and they embark on a mission to save the Earth(n)

programme.title: Bucky Larson: Born to Be a Star
programme.desc: Adam Sandler co-writes and produces this Columbia Pictures comedy starring Nick Swardson as Bucky Larson, a nerd from nowhere who heads out West to become a porn star after finding out his parents were ones themselves. Upon arriving in Hollywood, a waitress (Christina Ricci) with self-esteem issues gets him situated in the slightly less seedy part of town. Meanwhile, Bucky connects with a friend of his parents, Miles Deep (Don Johnson), who pities the backwards man-child and gives him a shot in the world of porn - only to discover that he's severely lacking in both experience and manliness. Through sheer luck, the footage of Bucky becomes a viral hit on the internet and he is propelled to the top of the adult film business, irking the current king of porn actors, Dick Shadow (Stephen Dorff), who'll do anything to not be in the shadow of the small time fool. The Hot Chick's Tom Brady handled directing duties(n)

programme.desc: Uma Thurman stars as an assassin who seeks bloody revenge on those who left her for dead on her wedding day(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2

Espionage thriller with a comic edge(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and the crew set sail once again for this, the third chapter in the swashbuckling Pirates of the Caribbean trilogy. Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp) is hopelessly trapped in Davy Jones' locker after a harrowing encounter with the dreaded Kracken, and now Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) and Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) must align themselves with the nefarious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) if they hold out any hope of saving their old friend from a fate worse than death. The East India Trading Company and its fearsome leader, Lord Cutler Beckett (Tom Hollander), have taken control of the ghostly Flying Dutchman and its captain, Davy Jones (Bill Nighy), and now the baleful Admiral Norrington (Jack Davenport) has taken the helm in a relentless bid to destroy every pirate ship in his path and bring the Age of Piracy to a violent close. Meanwhile, Will, Elizabeth, and Captain Barbossa navigate treacherous waters and face bitter betrayal as they set sail to gather the only army that can stand up to Beckett -- The Nine Lords of the Brethren Court. But Captain Jack Sparrow is one of the lords, and as long as he's stuck in Davy Jones' locker, Beckett and his nefarious armada are sure to emerge victorious. There's still hope, however, if the heroic team that includes Tia Dalma (Naomie Harris), Pintel (Lee Arenberg), and Ragetti (Mackenzie Crook) can reach exotic Singapore and convince vulpine pirate Sao Feng (Chow Yun-Fat) to provide them with charts and a ship. But even the powerful Brethren Court may need a bit of help from volatile sea goddess Calypso in order to weather the coming storm. With the entire future of the pirate way at stake, everyone will be forced to choose sides while drifting precariously to the edge of the earth for one final, spectacular battle(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 1. Part 1 of 3. A McCoy is murdered by a Hatfield and a forbidden love affair begins at the start of the legendary Hatfield-McCoy family feud, which nearly brought the states of Kentucky and West Virginia to civil war in the 1880s(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: Ex-Playboy Bunny Shelley Darlingson causes campus chaos when she joins a sorority of geeky girls and helps them turn their love lives around(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: An interracial couple moves into their California dream home, only to find themselves the target of their volatile next-door neighbor -- a racist LAPD officer -- in this tightly wound thriller starring Samuel L. Jackson and Kerry Washington. Newlyweds Chris and Lisa seem like they have the perfect marriage and now, with their new home in the exclusive community Lakeview Terrace, the perfect life as well, but things soon turn ugly in the posh neighborhood when they begin to receive threats from their neighbor Abel, a middle-aged LAPD officer who has obvious objections to the couple's interracial marriage. What starts as an attitude problem soon morphs into full-on harassment, and before long the couple finds that their worries go far beyond their property values -- or the encroaching California wildfire burning in view of their community -- as they begin to fear for their lives(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: In a throwback to 1970s exploitation films and drive-in double features, directors Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez serve up a chilling two-fer with "Death Proof" and "Planet Terror." The first is about a killer car; the second's a zombie flick. In the opener, Kurt Russell plays a stuntman wreaking havoc with his wheels of death. Then, survivors of a bio-weapon mishap battle an army of killer zombies. Rose McGowan has roles in both. Tarantino and Rodriguez also scripted their films(n)

programme.title: John Ford Goes to War
programme.desc: This program salutes the legendary filmmaker who, during World War II, ran the Field Photographic Branch, a unit that shot a raft of documentaries that captured "the scope and sprawl of World War II." Kris Kristofferson is the narrator. Included are comments by Hollywood directors Oliver Stone and Peter Bogdanovich; and critics Leonard Maltin, Andrew Sarris and Richard Schickel(n)

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: Widescreen Science-fiction adventure in which scientists discover a time portal which connects with a distant world. Left by the Egyptians, the Stargate is re-activated in the 20th-century and Colonel Jack O'Neil (Kurt Russell) and Egyptologist Dr Daniel Jackson (James Spader) are picked to head a crack team of explorers who venture through the gate to whatever lies beyond(n)

programme.title: Bait
programme.desc: A powerful tsunami sends ocean waters rushing into an underground supermarket, prompting the terrified shoppers to fight for their lives as vicious man-eating sharks glide down the aisles in this tense tale of deep-sea terror(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Scientists scramble to stop a giant comet that is threatening to destroy Earth in this drama(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In a future, android-dependent world, a robot is implicated in a murder, despite this being seemingly impossible according to the laws of robotics(n)

programme.desc: In a feature-length SG-1 special, Ba'al travels back in time and erases the Stargate programme from history. Can the team put the timeline back on track?(n)

programme.desc: In a future, android-dependent world, a robot is implicated in a murder, despite this being seemingly impossible according to the laws of robotics(n)

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Night 1. The dawn of the CIA is chronicled via the experiences of three college grads---including the idealistic Jack McAuliffe (Chris O'Donnell)---who are recruited as spies and drawn into shadowy Cold War espionage. Jack is mentored by a master spy (Alfred Molina), and the two set out to unmask a mole within the ranks. Jack also develops an unhealthy attraction to a fetching spy (Alexandra Maria Lara). Michael Keaton also stars. Executive produced by brother filmmakers Tony and Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Night 2. In the late 1950s, Jack (Chris O'Donnell) journeys to Hungary to assist an uprising against the Soviets. But when the strengthening Soviets fight back, Jack is imprisoned, along with an Englishwoman (Natascha McElhone). Later, Jack becomes entangled in the Bay of Pigs debacle. Meanwhile, an intelligence expert (Michael Keaton) grows overly consumed with unmasking a CIA mole. Executive produced by Tony and Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Night 3. Angleton (Michael Keaton) pushes ahead to unmask a mole within the CIA ranks, obtaining inside information from a Russian defector. His prime suspect: a high-ranking leader in the CIA. Meanwhile, KGB master spy Starik (Ulrich Thomsen) attempts to launch his final plan to defeat the U.S. Jack: Chris O'Donnell(n)

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: Adventure thriller about a reporter who is investigating the story behind a series of disappearances in the Caribbean when he is captured by a lost tribe of pirates. The villains, who have been looting and pillaging in the region since the 18th century, need a new leader and seem to think one of their captives is a good prospect. Based on a novel by Peter Benchley(n)

programme.title: Down Missouri Way
programme.desc: Hectic times in the Ozarks when a movie company arrives to shoot location scenes. Martha O'Driscoll. Mortimer: Eddie Dean. Dunning: John Carradine. Mike: William Wright. Cindy: Mabel Todd. Gloria: Renee Godfrey. Pappy: Roscoe Ates. Mild amusement(n)

programme.title: Super Capers
programme.desc: A wannabe superhero joins a team of bumbling heroes-in-training on a time-traveling mission to thwart an evil plot in this high-flying comedy featuring Clint Howard, Adam West, Tom Sizemore, and Doug Jones. Ed Gruberman (Justin Whalin) may not possess any actual superpowers, but his passion for fighting crime rivals that of even the greatest comic-book do-gooders. When Ed becomes a member of The Super Capers, an oddball team of aspiring superheroes, it seems as if his dream of fighting crime for real is about to come true. Upon discovering evidence of an evil plot involving gold bullion, an alluring femme fatale, and a powerful criminal mastermind, Ed travels back in time to prevent a disaster the likes of which the world has never seen(n)

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: A stylish period thriller in which a gentleman crook and a master safe-cracker attempt the first moving train robbery - their target a British Army payroll on its way to the Crimean War(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Red-Headed Stranger.
programme.desc: Country singer Willie Nelson is wrongly accused of murder - but fortunately Adrian is one of his biggest fans and resolves to prove him innocent. To complicate matters, the prosecution has a witness - a blind woman who claims she can identify the culprit by his voice.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane employs dubious tactics to catch the killer of a woman who was accused of stealing $1million from her employer. Setting up camp in an empty house near the victim's home, he pins a mysterious note to the door and settles back to wait, optimistic the killer will fall for the bait. Elsewhere, a messy result in another case leads CBI boss Virgil Minelli to take Lisbon off the Red John investigation. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team are called to Sacramento, where the body of an aide to state senator Melinda Batson has been found. They arrest her stepbrother on suspicion of murder, but Jane believes political blackmail could have been the motive behind the killing, and begins his own investigation into the case. Crime drama, guest starring Paul Michael Glaser (Starsky and Hutch), with Simon Baker, Robin Tunney and Fay Masterson.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nathan and the team target a greedy debt collector stealing funds from innocent taxpayers. However, the job becomes much more complicated when they discover their mark is also a domestic terrorist funding an armed militia. Crime drama, guest starring Clancy Brown.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nathan and the team tackle a crooked car dealer, and decide they must play the villain at his own game to bring him down. Crime drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The body of a Navy lieutenant is found on the side of a remote road and toxicology tests reveal he died of overhydration. When another man is found dead nearby, the NCIS team begins to suspect a serial killer is on the loose. Meanwhile, Ducky introduces Gibbs to his new girlfriend. Crime drama, guest starring Cheryl Ladd.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Homeland Security employee Victor Sterling mysteriously disappears and his car is found at a drive-through restaurant that becomes the scene of a double murder. To complicate matters further, the missing man's outspoken spouse happens to be the ex-wife of both Gibbs and Fornell. American naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, Joe Spano, Tom Gallop and Melinda McGraw.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A child molester Lisbon caught and convicted in San Francisco is found shot dead near CBI headquarters in Sacramento, but when the gun is found to have her prints on it, she is accused of the murder. Unable to remember the night of the crime, she tries to prove her innocence by undergoing a polygraph test - which she fails, leaving her no choice but to ask Jane for help. Drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and Lisbon investigate the death of a biker gang's lawyer, who they suspect was murdered because he knew too many of the members' secrets. However, another lead is uncovered when they meet a woman who held a grudge against him because he successfully defended her brother's alleged murderer in court. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team targets a criminal who has been blackmailing businessmen into committing crimes, but Nate receives a surprise when he discovers his father is responsible.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nate and the team infiltrate the coal mines of West Virginia in the wake of a deadly explosion, hoping to pin the blame on the site's corrupt owner Dan Blackwell. However, their investigations threaten not just their target, but also the livelihoods of everyone in the tight-knit community. Guest starring Bruce Davison.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. A military aircraft transporting the bodies of dead US marines back home crashes before reaching its destination, and Gibbs and the team are called in to help identify human remains at the site of the wreckage. However, a DNA discrepancy turns a routine investigation into a search for a missing person. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Ziva and Gibbs lead the mission to rescue the captured Marine in Afghanistan before discovering that her captor's brothers have bigger plans and are at large in America. Gibbs has to be stopped when he tries to employ methods similar to those used on Kinah and Lala in an effort to gain information, but Vance has a trick that gives the agents an idea of what the siblings have in mind.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Things become awkward between Hayley and her husband Jeff when she regresses to her six-year-old self. Meanwhile, Steve and his friends purchase a slow-cooker.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve helps Stan fix a problem with his office computer, but feels slighted by his father's colleagues when they claim he isn't `CIA material'. Then he is approached by the NSA, the CIA's nerdy arch-rivals, who make him an offer he cannot refuse. Meanwhile, committed vegetarian Hayley accidentally eats meat, and realises she still loves the taste.(n)

programme.title: Prison Break
programme.desc: Michael and Lincoln recruit Sheba and C-Note to help them catch Poseidon after both Sara and her son are threatened. Meanwhile, Whip embarks on a parallel mission.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jerome tries to prevent his daughter Pam from dating Chris, but when the loved-up pair run away together he must unite with Peter to track them down. Animation, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg has fun partying with Peter when he takes her to a college for an interview, and Brian has to learn how to live in the wild after being sprayed by a skunk and forbidden from entering the house.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine decides to hold a party to get to know her neighbours, but Stan becomes suspicious of an Iranian couple. In an attempt to find evidence to support his hunch, he breaks into their house and is thrown into jail. Meanwhile, Steve and Roger cause a power failure, sparking fears of a terrorist attack.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The church deacon chokes on a communion wafer, prompting Stan to pull out all the stops in a bid to replace him. Meanwhile, Francine rustles up a potato salad for the wake using a secret ingredient provided by Roger, and Steve finds himself falling in love. With the voice of Josh Groban.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: An unfortunate sky-diving accident leaves Peter in hospital, where he meets a man named Mahmoud. However, Quagmire and Joe are suspicious of the charismatic newcomer's motives, especially when Peter unexpectedly converts to Islam and is given a free mobile phone. Animated comedy, featuring the guest voice of Omid Abtahi.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Mayor West becomes the prime suspect when a murder is committed at his mansion. All of the evidence seems to point squarely at him being the guilty party, but as his trial begins one of the jurors begins to doubt his guilt. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Adam West.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine's lonely housewife novel is up for an award, so the family heads to the Big Apple for the ceremony, while Stan and Hayley spend time with actor Robert Wuhl.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan witnesses a couple die in a car crash, so goes to see a psychiatrist to help with the trauma. Meanwhile, Roger and Klaus study for a wine tasting.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and his friends fight to save their favourite booth in the Drunken Clam after it is claimed by another group of men. Meanwhile, Brian passes on herpes to Stewie. Adult animation, featuring the guest voice of Bryan Cranston (Breaking Bad).(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: The Most Interesting Man in the World.
programme.desc: Peter takes Stewie to the park for some father-son bonding, but ends up bringing home someone else's baby. After Lois chastises him for being so stupid, he goes to Chicago on a business trip and returns an intelligent, classy person.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan forgets his wedding anniversary and in desperation arranges to have 20 hours erased from Francine's memory at the CIA headquarters. However, the procedure goes awry and the hours are turned into years - so she reverts to her wild-child days and moves into her old apartment with Hayley.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The family thinks Roger has died and throws him out with the rubbish, but he wakes up at the dump and tries to make his way home. Unfortunately he is involved in a case of mistaken identity en route and ends up being taken on a pensioners' tour of the White House.(n)

programme.desc: Forced to make a nerve-racking cross-country flight with Sharona, a nervous Adrian whiles away the anxiety of the journey by studying his fellow passengers - and soon concludes that the Frenchman sitting across the aisle has just murdered his wife. Tony Shalhoub stars, with a guest appearance by his wife Brooke Adams.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: An architect is found dead at his mansion by a police officer who claims a ghost could have had some involvement in the murder. The team investigates conventional leads, while Jane concentrates on pursuing the supernatural angle, discovering there is rumoured to be treasure hidden in the building. Elsewhere, Rigsby confesses his true feelings to Grace. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Bosco arrests Jane after discovering the bug in his office, leaving Cho and the other agents to investigate a murder case. They believe the victim was killed in a dispute over oil-rich land, and when they hand evidence over to Patrick he comes up with leads from the confines of his cell - before setting into motion an elaborate escape plan. Guest starring Ashley Jones (True Blood), with Simon Baker and Terry Kinney.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The vigilante crooks take time out from their hectic lives to share tales of glory from a time before they joined forces. As they compare notes, they begin to realise they each tried to steal the same rare artefact five years earlier - unaware they were competing against their future team-mates in the race to secure the item.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team discovers an antiquities trafficker working for Moreau is using refugee children as mules to smuggle artifacts, and travels to London to lure him into an auction house scam. While there, Sophie faces the consequences of her past actions. Guest starring James Frain (True Blood).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony is forced to tackle a case with a personal element when his father is discovered drunk in a car that has a dead body in the boot. The victim is revealed to be Navy lieutenant Dean Massey, who DiNozzo Sr had threatened to kill after being cut out of a land development deal. Guest starring Robert Wagner.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Navy captain Jake Marsden is murdered in his hotel room and inquiries lead to marine lieutenant Emma Reynolds - who tells the team she was the intended target. After being stationed in Kabul, she became pregnant by a local man called Amir who was later killed in action - and Abby discovers he was the sole male heir of a wealthy family that owns a large tract of land in a politically sensitive part of Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: Stan Smith is Keanu Reeves as Stanny Utah in Point Breakers.
programme.desc: Stan hopes a beach-based assignment infiltrating a group of renegade surfers will be good for his dangerously high blood pressure. Meanwhile, Jeff and Haley have a pregnancy scare, Steve befriends a homeless drifter, and Roger tries to persuade Fifa to host the next World Cup in the Smiths' back yard. Animated comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Joe is injured when Peter, Cleveland, and Quagmire decide to run with the bulls, while Brian sleeps with a woman who is married to a Navy Seal.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve becomes Langley Fall's most hated man after he convinces the town's star quarterback to give up playing football, and Hayley becomes a cab driver to pay off gambling debts.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter helps Joe to publish a book, but things get out of hand when he starts to take on the writing as well. Elsewhere, Brian begins an extreme exercise regime after experiencing a runner's high for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Cleveland returns to Quahog, but he and Peter are not allowed to spend time together after Lois and Donna get into a big fight over their parenting styles.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and Chris interrupt Stewie's TV time, prompting the angry baby to go back in time to break up Peter and Lois so he's never conceived. However, he is instead reborn into a Downton Abbey-esque British household.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Whacking Day. Principal Skinner (voice of Harry Shearer) ought to be used to misbehavior from Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright) by now, but when Bart escapes from the school's basement after being locked-in to avoid any unpleasantness during a visit by Superintendent Chalmers (voice of Hank Azaria) and manages to run over Chalmers with a lawn tractor, Skinner has had enough and expels Bart. Rather than allow him to sit around all day, Marge (voice of Julie Kavner) encourages her son to read Johnny Tremain, which Bart does after learning the title character is deformed in an accident. To the surprise of everyone, Bart turns into a budding history buff. Meanwhile, the curious Springfield custom of Whacking Day, in which the local spend one day each year beating snakes senseless, has drawn the ire of Lisa (voice of Yeardley Smith), who is offended by the purposeless cruelty to animals. In an effort to help save the snakes from a grim fate, Lisa attempts to attract the serpents to the safety of the Simpson home with the help of her funky bass guitar and the voice of visiting soul icon Barry White. Bart, meanwhile, has done some research and reveals the startling truth behind the origins of Whacking Day. "Whacking Day" first aired on April 29, 1993(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Day the Violence Died. Bart wants justice done after learning that the animator (voice of Kirk Douglas) who created Itchy was ripped off. Lionel Hutz takes the animator's case. Other voices: William Hickey, Alex Rocco, Suzanne Somers(n)

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into a haunted house where his daughter befriends the amiable ghost of a young boy - but things start to go awry when three smelly spooks and two dastardly crooks try to chase the new residents away. Family comedy, starring Christina Ricci, Bill Pullman, Eric Idle, Cathy Moriarty and featuring the voice of Malachi Pearson.(n)

programme.title: Starman

Sci-fi fantasy romance, directed by John Carpenter and starring Jeff Bridges, Karen Allen, Charles Martin Smith, Richard Jaeckel and Robert Phalen.(n)

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: A wildlife photographer is forced to master his fears and the elements as he leads an expedition to climb K2, the world's second highest mountain, on a desperate mission to rescue his estranged sister and her fellow mountaineers, who have fallen into a crevasse. Action adventure, starring Chris O'Donnell, Bill Paxton, Scott Glenn and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: The former member of the X-Men is lured out of hiding and travels to Japan, where a dying businessman offers him the chance to give up his immortality for a normal life. He ends up robbed of his superhuman powers by a mysterious scientist and is forced to protect the tycoon's granddaughter from a secret conspiracy's assassins. Superhero adventure spin-off, starring Hugh Jackman and Tao Okamoto.(n)

programme.title: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Two disillusioned Crusaders return home to find the land devastated by the Black Death. A cardinal persuades them to escort a suspected witch to a monastery to stand trial for causing the plague, but during their journey, they realise she has supernatural powers beyond their reckoning. Fantasy adventure, starring Nicolas Cage and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: A vampire slayer heads for Transylvania to help a gypsy princess destroy evil bloodsucker Count Dracula and bring his reign of terror to an end. But he must first do battle with a werewolf, Frankenstein's monster and the count's trio of sharp-toothed brides. Gothic action adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Kate Beckinsale, Richard Roxburgh and David Wenham.(n)

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: An admiral takes charge of an experimental submarine just as the world is plunged into catastrophe. A belt of radiation surrounding the planet has ignited, threatening all life on Earth. The admiral believes he can end the crisis with a well-aimed nuclear missile, but faces an uphill struggle to convince high command that his plan will not lead to more destruction. Sci-fi adventure, with Walter Pidgeon, Joan Fontaine and Robert Sterling.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Jack
programme.desc: A bumbling midshipman's uniform is stolen by a woman desperate to go to sea, who adopts his identity. Later, the hapless sailor is press-ganged on to the same ship as her. However, while trying to prove who he really is, he has to contend with mutinies, pirates and the Spanish Navy. Comedy, with Bernard Cribbins, Juliet Mills, Kenneth Williams and Charles Hawtrey.(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
programme.desc: A hapless youngster faces the daunting prospect of starting a new school year and desperately tries to impress a girl in his class. But as if that weren't enough to contend with, his parents also force him to spend more time with his bullying older brother. Children's comedy sequel, starring Zachary Gordon and Devon Bostick.(n)

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A socially inept high-school student and his lonely unemployed brother find their eccentric home life thrown into upheaval when their meddling uncle comes to stay. The teenage oddball tries to make the best of his changing circumstances, while putting all his skills to the task of helping his new best friend win the class presidency. Comedy, starring Jon Heder, Efren Ramirez and Haylie Duff.(n)

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Children's adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci.(n)

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: Two undercover agents - one working for the DEA the other for the Navy - infiltrate a drug cartel, only for the planned sting operation to go disastrously wrong. Both operatives become fugitives and must work together to survive - but both keep their true identity a secret, mistakenly thinking the other is a real criminal. Action adventure, starring Denzel Washington and Mark Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: A prison psychologist probes the mind of a maximum-security inmate, an expert on primate behaviour, to find out what made the zoologist go berserk and murder two park rangers in Rwanda. Drama, inspired by Daniel Quinn's novel Ishmael, starring Anthony Hopkins, Cuba Gooding Jr, Donald Sutherland, George Dzundza and Maura Tierney.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond creates a menu with black beans at the centre, including mango guacamole and taco pizza, as well as grilled veggie burritos and a quick black bean burger.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond's sister visits the ranch, so frittata, kale citrus salad, mystery rolls and lemon and lime pound cake are on the menu for an evening of cooking and eating.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Theo Randall and Rachel Allen set off on a culinary road trip to compete in cookery contests around the UK, beginning by travelling to Rothesay on the Isle of Bute and putting their quiches up for scrutiny at the Bute Agricultural Society's summer show. programme.title: Country Show Cook Off

programme.title: Patricia Heaton Parties
programme.desc: Patricia picks out some favourite recipes to make for her boys, including shepherd's pie, popovers with roast beef and horseradish, strawberry trifle and a fresh fruit sangria.(n)

programme.title: Patricia Heaton Parties
programme.desc: Patricia offers recipe ideas for a friendly dinner party, including cranberry cornbread bites, hot leek dip, prosciutto-wrapped pears, and cherry crumbles with ice cream.(n)

programme.desc: Jamie Oliver provides tips on hosting a barbecue and demonstrates simple rules that guarantee properly cooked food every time. programme.title: Jamie at Home

programme.title: The Piglet Files
programme.desc: MI5 has a problem on their hands when two aircraft designers defect from Russia.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin is overjoyed when Paul announces he is leaving the area as he cannot find suitable premises for his business, but later faces a quandry when he changes upon an available property in the ideal location. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Peter Egan.(n)

programme.title: My Hero
programme.desc: George reluctantly agrees to take in Janet's parents' pooch Biggles - but it's not long before the superhero has expanded his repertoire to include talking to the animals, and sets off on a mission of mercy to reunite the depressed doggy with his long-lost mum. Meanwhile, Mrs Raven finally goes too far and is given the boot from the health centre.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Jean pays an unexpected visit during Lionel's lecture tour - only to be surprised herself. Comedy, starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: dinnerladies
programme.desc: Twinkle and Stan spoil Petula's plans for a peaceful family Christmas, and a baby is found abandoned near the canteen. Bren's romance with Tony is ruined by the unexpected reappearance of her husband, and Anita goes away - but leaves her inflatable man behind. Festive special from 1999, starring Victoria Wood.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Cupid's arrow targets Truly when a woman from his past returns with amorous intentions, so everyone lends a hand in liberating him. Frank Thornton, Peter Sallis and Brian Murphy star in the last episode to feature Thora Hird as Edie Pegden.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Barry wins a competition - but when the prize proves more trouble than it is worth, it spells disaster for him and everyone who helps him try to get rid of it. Mike Grady stars.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Chaos abounds at an annual parade held to celebrate a famous battle. The lifelike effigy of the old General has been spruced up and Nora Batty prepares to sit on a float playing the part of his wife. Norman Wisdom makes a cameo appearance.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy cannot believe his ears when Rodney tells him he has found a girlfriend. The trouble is, the woman is old enough to be his mother - and to make matters worse, her husband is about to be released from prison.(n)

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: When Ben and Susan discover Michael has been seeing a therapist, they are prompted to undertake a spot of self-analysis. Domestic comedy, starring Robert Lindsay and Zoe Wanamaker as harassed parents.(n)

programme.title: My Hero
programme.desc: George reluctantly agrees to take in Janet's parents' pooch Biggles - but it's not long before the superhero has expanded his repertoire to include talking to the animals, and sets off on a mission of mercy to reunite the depressed doggy with his long-lost mum. programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles

programme.title: dinnerladies
